snippet: AMSTEIN--Charles A.,died in New York City on April 7, 2016. He was 82 years old. A native of Kansas, he served two years in the US Army before entering Union Theological Seminary. Ordained as Presbyterian Minister in 1962, Rev. Amstein served churches in Indiana and Wisconsin. In 1977 he became the Associate Pastor of the Madison Avenue PC in New York City. After retiring in 1995 he was active at the Rutgers PC. A memorial service is planned for June 11 at 4pm at Rutgers Church. 1/3
lead_paragraph: AMSTEIN--Charles A.,died in New York City on April 7, 2016. He was 82 years old. A native of Kansas, he served two years in the US Army before entering Union Theological Seminary. Ordained as Presbyterian Minister in 1962, Rev. Amstein served churches in Indiana and Wisconsin. In 1977 he became the Associate Pastor of the Madison Avenue PC in New York City. After retiring in 1995 he was active at the Rutgers PC. A memorial service is planned for June 11 at 4pm at Rutgers Church. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AMSTEIN, CHARLES A.
